original_text: Even when we were there with you, we told you this rule: ‘If anyone refuses to work, you should not give food to him.’
korean_text: 우리가 너희와 함께 있을 때에도 너희에게 명하기를 누구든지 일하기 싫어하거든 먹지도 말게 하라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Even when we were there with you
you should not give food to him
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그에게 음식을 주지 말아야 한다
